text: Zbigniew Kazimierz Brzezinski ( ; ; March 28, 1928 - May 26, 2017) was a Polish American political scientist, geostrategist, and statesman. He served as the United States National Security Advisor to President Jimmy Carter from 1977 to 1981. Brzezinski died at a hospital in Falls Church, Virginia on May 26, 2017 from congestive heart failure at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American political scientists Category:Politicians from Warsaw Category:United States National Security Advisors Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
